food_description: A traditional Bangladeshi Kachchi Biriany. It's really tough to get good Kachchi Biryani in Dhaka city. It makes mouth water just to think about it.
A delicious Bangladeshi rice dish cooked with aromatic spices and tender beef, known for its unique flavor and texture.
A traditional Bangladeshi dish consisting of fermented rice and Hilsa fish, usually served with various accompaniments.
A flavorful and spicy Bengali rice dish made with a mix of lentils, vegetables, and aromatic spices, known for its comforting taste.
